subject: Re: [junit] Test Case Results segregation
msgSnippet: ... If you really need a separation, you can always put new functions into separate suites. I have never seen the need. Why do you want to separate them?
messageBody:
On Fri, 03 Dec 2004 11:01:18 -0000, ramandeep340 <ramandeep340@...> wrote:
>
>
> Hello,
>
> I would like to know if there is a mechanism to segregate
> test case results based on some version. e.g I have test
> functions which were added in different versions of test
> suite, can I segregate the results based on these versions.
>
> I can identify the versions may be by adding a javadoc or
> some kind of parsing. Personally, i am not infavor of parsing
> technique.

If you really need a separation, you can always put new functions into
separate suites. I have never seen the need. Why do you want to
separate them?
